definition[0]: a substance that is formed naturally in the earth, such as coal, salt, stone, or gold. Minerals can be dug out of the ground and used
example[0]: The area is very rich in minerals.
example[1]: a country with few mineral resources
definition[1]: a natural substance such as iron that is present in some foods and is important for good health
example[2]: Fish is a rich source of vitamins and minerals.
